tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Examinations,Dental Braces Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Got to know about Puranik's dental care while I was searching for a female othtodontist to get the dental braces. was impressed with the reviews and ratings seen on Practo and Google and decided to have a visit. The best thing about Doctor Divya is she is very responsive and addresses to the case proactively over WhatsApp and calls . She follows up about the patient on regular basis which allow us to share in case of any issues without hesitation. We had to go for wisdom tooth extraction and she got an expertise surgeon and the extraction was done so friendly and smoothly. She listen to the patient's concerns and suggest the right and required treatment. One good thing abo Dr Divya is she has her own clinic and you can get the concerns addressed w r t dental braces in fastest way unlike other orthodontist who visits their partners clinic ok monthly basis. I will post another review after few months of treatment and results. I highly recommend to visit Puranik's dental care for any dental services.Thank you Dr Divya for the care and support you show to the patient. Wer really appreciate your service.
reply_text: This means alot.Thank you for taking out the time to share your  treatment experience!

review:
We visited Dr. Puranik to get braces fitted for my daughter to set right her misaligned teeth.
Right from day 1, Dr. Puranik was very friendly and helpful. 
She explained the entire process in detail, made my daughter shed her inhibitions towards braces and offered us all the available options clearly.
She let us choose the option as per our budget and never pushed or influenced us to go for expensive ones.
Dr. Puranik is very knowledgeable, fully approachable and flexible in modifying appointment timings. We've never had to wait for our turn even a single time. She makes herself available exactly at the appointment time.
We are so far very happy with her and highly recommend her.
We have several more sittings to go before the final outcome, so I'll post another review at the end.
reply_text: Thank you!

review: I recommend Dr. Divya Puranik for all dental treetments. I am undergoing Damom clear braces treetment from past 1 year. She is very professional caring & gentle. She explained the treetment plan & cleard all my doubts abt the treetment. I have undergone scaling & polishing of teeths many times and  my braces treetment is going well. I am satisfied with the care i received.  So you should also visit her without any hesitation to treet your dental issues.
reply_text: Thank you for taking out some time to write such a detailed review! Means alot .

review: Today got my root canal and cap filing done here. Dr. Divya Puranik is very much experienced dentist. She is very calm and explains every step while performing the dental procedure. The clinic is also very much hygienic and clean. Highly recommend this clinic.
reply_text: Thank you Aditya for sharing your patient story on Practo. üôè

review: Dr. Divya is so good and explained about the procedure in detail answering every question of mine. She made me feel at ease throughout the procedure and I‚Äôm satisfied with the treatment I have received. I would highly recommend Dr. Divya for first time dental patients or those who are worried about their dental procedures.
reply_text: Thankyou madam for your words of appreciation. We hope to provide you a great patient experience every visit!

review: Very diligent and good at what she is doing. I am extremely satisfied with the root canal and capping services done for my 3 molar teeth.  Highly recommend her for the dental issues of any kind
reply_text: Thankyou for sharing your experience!

review: Hi,My daughter is taking treatment from OrthodontistDr. Divya Puranik since 7 months.Thank you, Dr. Divya for the Quality work done on her teeth.She explained all the pros &cons of the treatment.Dr. Divya is very caring & understanding.She's very helpful, supportive & made my daughter's smile Beautiful.
reply_text: Thankyou for sharing your experience!

review: I had a wonderful experience at  Puraniks dental care. I completed my clear aligner treatment. The entire journey was a breeze, thanks to the exceptional care provided by Dr Divya Puranik .her calm and patient attitude helped me clear all my treatment doubts . I would highly recommend the dental clinic to anyone looking for orthodontic treatment. I am more than happy with the treatment. She helped me ensure that all aligners were tracking well.I am beyond thrilled with the results.
reply_text: Thank you for your review .  Special thanks for such a detailed feedback üôè
